item.Name: Abs
item.Description: Returns the absolute value of a specified number.

item.Name: Acos
item.Description: Returns the angle whose cosine is the specified number.

item.Name: Asin
item.Description: Returns the angle whose sine is the specified number.

item.Name: Atan
item.Description: Returns the angle whose tangent is the specified number.

item.Name: Ceiling
item.Description: Returns the smallest integer greater than or equal to the specified number.

item.Name: Cos
item.Description: Returns the cosine of the specified angle.

item.Name: Exp
item.Description: Returns e raised to the specified power.

item.Name: Floor
item.Description: Returns the largest integer less than or equal to the specified number.

item.Name: IEEERemainder
item.Description: Returns the remainder resulting from the division of a specified number by another specified number.

item.Name: Log
item.Description: Returns the logarithm of a specified number.

item.Name: Log10
item.Description: Returns the base 10 logarithm of a specified number.

item.Name: Max
item.Description: Returns the larger of two specified numbers.

item.Name: Min
item.Description: Returns the smaller of two numbers.

item.Name: Pow
item.Description: Returns a specified number raised to the specified power.

item.Name: Round
item.Description: Rounds a value to the nearest integer or specified number of decimal places. The mid number behaviour can be changed by using EvaluateOption.RoundAwayFromZero during construction of the Expression object.

item.Name: Sign
item.Description: Returns a value indicating the sign of a number.

item.Name: Sin
item.Description: Returns the sine of the specified angle.

item.Name: Sqrt
item.Description: Returns the square root of a specified number.

item.Name: Tan
item.Description: Returns the tangent of the specified angle.

item.Name: Truncate
item.Description: Calculates the integral part of a number.

item.Name: in
item.Description: Returns whether an element is in a set of values.

item.Name: if
item.Description: Returns a value based on a condition.
